questions.question: What is SpeedHeart?
questions.answer: SpeedHeart is a community-driven dating platform that brings together like-minded singles through AI-powered matching and vibrant communities. Join communities like Book Lovers, Adventurers, or Foodies to connect with people who share your passions. Experience meaningful conversations through speed dating, compatibility tests, and group chats. Our platform focuses on building genuine connections within supportive communities where everyone belongs.

questions.question: How do I sign up?
questions.answer: Create an account with your email and password on the home page. Complete your profile with a photo, gender, age, location, and interests to start matching. Go to [Profile](#profile) to set it up.

questions.question: Is SpeedHeart free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, SpeedHeart is completely free! Join the queue, get matched, and chat without any cost.

questions.question: What is the AI Quiz?
questions.answer: The AI Quiz is SpeedHeart's smart way to place you in the perfect communities! Answer fun questions about your interests, hobbies, and personality to join communities like Book Lovers, Adventure Seekers, Creative Souls, or Tech Enthusiasts. Each community has its own group chats, events, and dating pools, making it easier to find people who truly get you. Your community placement helps create better matches and more meaningful connections.

questions.question: What are the requirements for the AI Quiz?
questions.answer: You need to complete your profile (photo, gender, age, location, interests) first. Go to [Profile](#profile) to finish setting up, then head to [Communities](#communities) to take the quiz.

questions.question: How does the AI Quiz work?
questions.answer: Answer a series of fun questions about your preferences and hobbies. Your answers help us place you in communities for better matches. Start at [Communities](#communities)!

questions.question: Can I retake the AI Quiz?
questions.answer: Yes, you can retake the AI Quiz anytime from [Communities](#communities) to update your community matches.

questions.question: What is the Compatibility Test?
questions.answer: The Compatibility Test assesses your dating preferences and values to find your best matches. Take it at [Date](#date) after completing your profile and AI Quiz.

questions.question: What are the requirements for the Compatibility Test?
questions.answer: You must complete your profile (photo, gender, age, location, interests) and the AI Quiz first. Visit [Profile](#profile) and [Communities](#communities) to finish, then go to [Date](#date).

questions.question: How do I unlock Meet Your Matches?
questions.answer: Complete the Compatibility Test at [Date](#date) to unlock the 'Meet Your Matches' section, where you can connect with compatible singles.

questions.question: Can I retake the Compatibility Test?
questions.answer: No, the Compatibility Test can only be taken once to ensure authentic personality profiling and maintain match quality. Your initial responses create your permanent compatibility profile used for all future matching.

questions.question: How does matching work?
questions.answer: SpeedHeart's community-focused matching connects you with compatible singles in three ways: 1) Community Matches - Meet people from your shared communities (Book Lovers, Adventurers, etc.), 2) Speed Dating Queue - Get matched for quick conversations based on preferences and compatibility, 3) Group Events - Join community events and group chats to meet multiple people at once. All matches consider your AI Quiz results and community interests for better connections.

questions.question: Why am I not getting matches?
questions.answer: Ensure your profile, AI Quiz, and Compatibility Test are complete. Adjust your preferences in [Profile](#profile) or wait for more users to join the queue.

questions.question: How long do I stay in the queue?
questions.answer: You stay in the queue until matched or you leave manually. Check the queue in [Date](#date).

questions.question: Can I leave the queue anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, tap 'Leave Queue' in [Date](#date) to exit anytime.

questions.question: What makes a good profile?
questions.answer: Use clear, recent photos and fill out your gender, age, location, and interests. A complete profile improves your matches. Update it at [Profile](#profile).

questions.question: Can I change my preferences?
questions.answer: Yes, update your age range, distance, or interests anytime in [Profile](#profile).

questions.question: How do I add photos?
questions.answer: Go to [Profile](#profile) and tap the photo upload areas to add multiple photos.

questions.question: Can I hide my profile?
questions.answer: Profiles are visible in the queue. Leave the queue in [Date](#date) to stay private.

questions.question: How long do speed dating chats last?
questions.answer: Speed dating chats have a short time limit to keep things lively. Continue chatting if both agree! Start in [Date](#date).

questions.question: What happens after a speed dating session?
questions.answer: If both users want to continue, you can chat freely in [Messages](#messages).

questions.question: Can I report inappropriate behavior?
questions.answer: Yes, use the report button in chat or on a user's profile. Visit [Support](#support/contact) for more help.

questions.question: How do I block someone?
questions.answer: Block users from their profile or chat in [Messages](#messages). They won't contact you again.

questions.question: Is my personal information safe?
questions.answer: Yes, we protect your data and only share what you include in your profile. Learn more at [Support](#support/contact).

questions.question: What should I do if someone makes me uncomfortable?
questions.answer: Report and block them immediately. Check our Safety Center at [Support](#support/contact) for tips.

questions.question: Can I delete my account?
questions.answer: Yes, delete your account in [Settings](#settings) to remove your data permanently.

questions.question: How do I change my password?
questions.answer: Update your password in [Settings](#settings) using the 'Change Password' option.

questions.question: How do I switch between light and dark mode?
questions.answer: Toggle light or dark mode in [Settings](#settings) to customize your app's look.

questions.question: How do I contact support?
questions.answer: Visit [Support](#support/contact) to fill out a contact form with your questions or issues.

questions.question: Can I use SpeedHeart offline?
questions.answer: You bet, sweetheart! üòè Your app caches my smarts, so you can chat or browse profiles offline. Try asking me for 'matches' anywhere! If it's slow, check [Support](#support/contact).

questions.question: The app isn't working properly. What should I do?
questions.answer: Try logging out and back in or checking your internet. Contact us at [Support](#support/contact) if issues persist.

questions.question: I'm not receiving notifications.
questions.answer: Ensure notifications are enabled in your device settings. Check [Settings](#settings) for app notification options.

questions.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
questions.answer: Use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to get a reset email.

questions.question: How do I make my profile flirty?
questions.answer: Sprinkle some charm, love! Add a spicy bio like 'Chasing sunsets and sweet connections' and a cute photo. Want more? Ask me for 'profile tips' or head to [Profile](#profile)! üòò

questions.question: What's a good icebreaker for speed dating?
questions.answer: Try this: 'Is it hot in here, or is it just you?' üòè Ask me for 'conversation starters' to get more heart-melting lines, then shine in [Speed date](#lobby)!

questions.question: How do I get better matches?
questions.answer: Polish your profile and retake the AI Quiz to fine-tune your vibe! Go to [Profile](#profile) or [Communities](#communities) to refresh. Wanna know who's crushing on you? Check [Matches](#matches)! üòé

questions.question: How do I earn more badges?
questions.answer: Show off your charm! Join a speed date in [Speed date](#lobby), take the AI Quiz in [Communities](#communities), or chat with me for a 'Chat Champ' badge! üòò Check [Badges](#badges) to see your bling.

questions.question: What's the Flirty Star Badge?
questions.answer: It's for heart-stealers like you! Use a flirty pickup line in [Speed date](#lobby) or ask me for 'flirty tips' to earn it. Ready to shine? üåü

questions.question: How do I earn the Chat Champ Badge?
questions.answer: Chat up a storm with me! Send 5 messages in one go, and you'll be a Chat Champ! üòò Keep talking to unlock more fun at [Badges](#badges).

questions.question: What's the Flirty Master Badge?
questions.answer: Got a flirty side? Ask me for 'conversation starters' or 'flirty tips' to earn the Flirty Master Badge! üòè Head to [Speed date](#lobby) to use those lines. Check [Badges](#badges)!

questions.question: How do I get the Vibe Seeker Badge?
questions.answer: Share your vibe with me! Respond to my 'What's your vibe?' question, and you'll snag the Vibe Seeker Badge. üåü See it at [Badges](#badges).

questions.question: Can I earn badges offline?
questions.answer: Oh, you romantic! Chat with me offline to earn the Offline Romeo/Juliet Badge. My smarts are cached for you! üíû Check [Badges](#badges).

questions.question: What's the Dream Date Planner Badge?
questions.answer: Dreaming of romance? Answer my 'What's your dream date?' question to earn the Dream Date Planner Badge! üòò See your bling at [Badges](#badges).
